alert.note: Alert for White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued June 16 at 9:16PM PDT until June 18 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 11 PM PDT FRIDAY... ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... ...WIND ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... For this evening, winds have diminished to below advisory thresholds. Winds will be 10-15 mph with gusts to 25 mph during the overnight. Therefore the Wind Advisory has been canceled early. * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, south winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. For the High Wind Watch, south winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 70 mph possible. * WHERE...White Pine County. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from 9 AM to 11 PM PDT Friday. For the High Wind Watch, from Saturday morning through Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.
